courseDetails.title: Food E-commerce: Build Your Own Private Label Coffee Brand
courseDetails.shortDescription: Starting food e-commerce: building and growing your own coffee brand with private label suppliers
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Food E-commerce: Build Your Own Private Label Coffee Brand course. This is a comprehensive project based course where you will learn step by step on how to build and grow your private label coffee business. This course will be concentrating on three main objectives, the first one is supplier selection process where you will be guided step by step on how to find high quality and reliable coffees suppliers, the second objective is to build a fully functioning online store using Shopify, and the third objective is to grow your brand and promote your coffee products by running ads on Facebook and Tiktok. In the introduction session, you will learn the basic fundamentals of the private label coffee business, we will go over the market overview of this industry and learn how the private label coffee business actually works. you will get to know the full step by step process from selecting your suppliers, branding the product by adding your own logo and design to the coffee packaging all the way to product fulfilment which will be taken care by the suppliers. In addition to that, you will also learn why private label business is better compared to regular dropshipping models. Afterward, you will also learn how to find high quality and reliable coffee suppliers based on several KPIs, such as product quality, reputation, shipment duration, ingredients, minimum order quantity, and product variation. Then, you will learn how to perform market and product research using a tool called Helium 10 which you can use to identify high demand products in the market and relevant keywords to be used in your product description. Once you have learnt all necessary knowledge about private label coffee business, we will begin to set up the business, firstly you will build and design your online store using Shopify, then continued by connecting your Shopify online store with your coffee suppliers, in this case, we are going to use Supliful and Ghost Label as the coffee suppliers. After the online store has been created, you will learn how to generate stunning logos and design for your product packaging using Leonardo AI. Then, you will also learn several effective pricing strategies and get to know the ideal profit margin percentage that you should take. At the end of the course you will learn how to grow your brand, promote your coffee products, and reach more potential customers using social media, user generated content, email list, and also partnering with local coffee shops. Last but not least, you will also be guided step by step on how to generate compelling ad copy and set up ad campaigns on Tiktok, Facebook, and Instagram.

First of all, before getting into the course, we need to ask ourselves this question, why should we start a private label coffee business? Well, there are many answers to that question, firstly, people have consumed coffee for thousands of years, therefore, the demand for this particular product will always be there, secondly the global market size of coffee is huge, approximately $126 B which basically means that selling coffee product online has a lot of potential and has a bright prospects in the future. Lastly, the private label business model allows you to build your own brand without having to deal with inventory and order fulfilment.

Below are things that you can expect to learn from this course:

  • Learn the basic fundamentals of private label coffee business, such as getting to know market overview of the industry and the business process from selecting supplier to order fulfilment

  • Learn how to find high quality coffee suppliers by assessing product quality, reputation, lead times, ingredients, and minimum order quantity

  • Learn how to do market research, product research, and keyword research with Helium 10

  • Learn how to generate stunning logo and packaging design using Leonardo AI

  • Learn how to select coffee product, add logo and customise packaging design on Supliful

  • Learn how to select coffee product and submit inquiry to suppliers on Ghost Label

  • Learn how to connect Shopify store with Supliful account

  • Learn how to import coffee products from Supliful to Shopify store

  • Learn how to customise Shopify store and add customer support chatbot

  • Learn how to price your coffee product competitively in the market

  • Learn several marketing strategies to reach more potential customers, such as social media promotion, user generated content, partnering with local coffee shops, building email lists, and running ads

  • Learn how to generate compelling video ads using Magic Ads AI

  • Learn how to set up Facebook Ads and Instagram Ads campaign

  • Learn how to set up Tiktok Ads campaign
targetAudiences: People who are interested in starting their own coffee brand
People who are interested in Food E-commerce and private label business

courseDetails.title: Personal Capital Free Financial Planner Application
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn to use the financial planning tool and how it compares, and or, complements other accounting and finance tools
courseDetails.longDescription:
Personal Capital is currently a free software that can connect to financial institutions, pulling in financial asset and liability balances, as well as transaction detail, into one location.

The strong areas of benefit of using Personal Capital software are its ability to provide net worth or balance sheet information, investment management information, and planning tools such as retirement planning and other large planning goals.

The Personal Capital software also downloads transaction detail and allows for the categorization or assigning of accounts and tags that can then be used to generate an income statement. It also has budgeting tools to help with shorter-term cash flow management.

This course will discuss how to set up the Personal Capital software and link to accounts. We will also discuss some reasons why the software may be offered for free and look over Personal Capital data security.

We will compare the Personal Capital software to other types of software that can connect directly to financial institutions and pull financial information, such software generally falling into the category of accounting software that uses the double-entry accounting system or financial management software.

Accounting software using the double-entry accounting system includes packages such as QuickBooks, Xero, & Wave accounting. Although accounting software utilizes financial institution connectivity it generally does so differently than Personal Capital software, which falls into the financial management category. We will discuss the differences in software.

Other financial management and budgeting software include Quicken, Mint, and Microsoft Excel, Excel actually having a template called Money in Excel that has financial institution connectivity.

Learners will practice converting financial data into an income statement by downloading transactions from financial institutions, categorizing them, and then exporting them into Excel for sorting. We will compare the process with what would be done using accounting software like QuickBooks.

The course will discuss the benefits of the personal net worth or balance sheet functionality of Personal Capital software, the software pulling in assets and liability balances automatically for items such as bank accounts, investment accounts like 401(K), savings accounts, CD accounts, credit card balances, mortgage balances, and loan balances.

We will also discuss the benefit of the software providing more detail on our investment holdings and providing insights and suggestions to improve returns and reduce risk. The ability to pull investments into one place allows a more rounded analysis of the data than you may get from one brokerage account analyzed in isolation.

Learners will be able to use the projection planner to help plan for retirement and other large investment items. The Personal Capital software utilizes sophisticated analytical tools including a Monte Carlo Simulation tool.

We will also explore the home appraisal tool offered by the software and we will practice adding non-financial institution assets and liabilities, making our net worth or balance sheet completer and more accurate.
targetAudiences: Anybody who wants a tool to help with financial management
Accountants and bookkeepers who want to compare a financial management tool to accounting software

Dieses Wissen ist entscheidend, um die rechtlichen Aspekte von Immobilientransaktionen zu verstehen. Daraufhin widmen wir uns der Wertermittlung, einer Schlüsselkompetenz im Immobiliengeschäft. Sie lernen, wie der Wert einer Immobilie sachgerecht ermittelt wird, insbesondere wenn es um den Verkauf mit vorhandenen Mietern geht.

Wir behandeln verschiedene Methoden der Wertermittlung, darunter das Ertragswertverfahren, das Sachwertverfahren und die Nutzung des Bodenrichtwerts. Diese Methoden sind essentiell, um den realistischen Wert einer Immobilie zu bestimmen. Zusätzlich zeigen wir Ihnen, wie Sie mit Online-Tools arbeiten können, um Ihre Bewertungen zu unterstützen und zu ergänzen.

Ein weiterer wichtiger Teil des Kurses ist die finale Preisgestaltung. Hier lernen Sie, wie Sie alle zuvor erworbenen Kenntnisse nutzen, um einen angemessenen Verkaufspreis festzulegen. Wir behandeln auch die Bedeutung und Erstellung eines Energieausweises sowie den optimalen Einsatz von Bildern bei der Vermarktung von Immobilien.

Zudem erhalten Sie einen umfassenden Überblick über verschiedene Vertriebswege, einschließlich kostenfreier und kostenpflichtiger Optionen. Wir erläutern die Bedeutung von Besichtigungen, die Gestaltung von Reservierungsvereinbarungen und die wichtigen Schritte im Finanzierungsprozess.

Schließlich führen wir Sie durch die notwendigen Schritte bei der Arbeit mit einem Notar und beschäftigen uns mit den Aufgaben und Herausforderungen, die nach der Beurkundung eines Immobiliengeschäfts auf Sie zukommen.

Dieser Kurs bietet Ihnen nicht nur theoretisches Wissen, sondern auch praktische Einblicke und Tools, um in der Welt der Immobilien erfolgreich zu sein. Er ist ideal für alle, die ihre Kenntnisse im Bereich der Immobilienbewertung und -vermarktung vertiefen möchten.


Am Abschluss des Kurses stehe ich Ihnen selbstverständlich für alle offenen Fragen zur Verfügung und bin bereit, eventuelle Unklarheiten zu beseitigen.
targetAudiences: Besitzer und Erben von Immobilien und/oder Liegenschaften.
